net.sf.jclal.util.distancefunction

Class KNearestDistanceContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.util.sort.IndexValueContainer
      • net.sf.jclal.util.distancefunction.DistanceContainer
        • net.sf.jclal.util.distancefunction.KNearestDistanceContainer

  • public class KNearestDistanceContainer
extends DistanceContainer
    This class extends DistanceContainer class and allows to store the distance between a particular instance and its k-nearest neighbors.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo
